pr_title: [JBPM-9206] container id should be checked when retrieving process

timeline.message:
[JBPM-9206] container id should be checked when retrieving process

Throw exception when container id associated with that process id does
not match the container id specified in the request

replies.bodyText: I think we need to abort process instance always (probably it should a clean task for every test, but that will be a bigger change and will imply reviweing all test cases)

timeline.body: Shouldn't it be also inside the if-clause?

timeline.author: gmunozfe

replies.bodyText: I maitanined the behaviour of convertToProcessInstanceList, which includes the null item in the returned list, though Im not sure if this is the rigth approach, but it will be out of the scope of the jira anyway. I just made this change becuase there is an objetive and clear clystal risk of a null pointer exception being launch here, so I feel the need to fix it right away
replies.author: fjtirado

timeline.body:
placeholder {} is not needed here
```suggestion
            throw new ProcessInstanceNotFoundException("process instance " + variableDesc.getProcessInstanceId() + " does not belong to container " + containerId);
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
placeholder {} is not needed here

Suggested change
throw new ProcessInstanceNotFoundException("process instance " + variableDesc.getProcessInstanceId() + " does not belong to container {}" + containerId);
throw new ProcessInstanceNotFoundException("process instance " + variableDesc.getProcessInstanceId() + " does not belong to container " + containerId);
timeline.author: gmunozfe

timeline.bodyText:
Why don't add also
exceptionRule.expectMessage(FUNNY_CONTAINER_ID);
timeline.bodyHTML:
Why don't add also
exceptionRule.expectMessage(FUNNY_CONTAINER_ID);
timeline.author: gmunozfe

replies.bodyText:
hmmm, not really, if the container exist, but it is different from the one that the process intance was created into, the exception being launched will not necessarily contain the contaner id. The engine will locate a session, but that session will not include the id.
Since this is implementation detail, I thik I will remove expect message from the test in what it was used.
I will alsotry to  test the scenario in which the container exist but does not hold that processInstance
replies.author: fjtirado
